#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
 void fastread( unsigned long long *a){
    char c=0;
    while(c<33){
    c=getchar_unlocked();}
    *a=0;
    while(c>33){
    *a=*a*10+c-'0';
    c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    }
int main()
{
    unsigned long long j,t,n,i;
    
    

    fastread(&t);
     while(t--)
     {
     fastread(&n);
     if((n & (n-1)) ==0)
     printf("No\n");
     else printf("Yes\n");
     
     
     
    }
    return 0;
}
